alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron; Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 6:27PM CDT until July 27 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN IRON...SOUTHEASTERN ASHLAND...PRICE AND SOUTHEASTERN SAWYER COUNTIES... At 627 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rice Creek Natural Area, to Willow Lake, to near Ogema, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Turtle Flambeau Flowage, Phillips, Mercer, Fifield, Ogema, Prentice, Spirit, Catawba, Long Lake, Kennan, Van Buskirk, Pike Lake, Manitowish, Wilson Lake Near Phillips, Fisher Lake, Brantwood, Cranberry Lake, and Musser Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado, go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
